name: Computer Parts Manufacturer
features: It has been made responsive using Tailwind CSS with Daisy UI. You can log in here using Gmail and a custom email. You can add review manage orders etc. Admin can manage all users. You can make payment of orders.
technology: JavaSCript, ReactJS, JSX, React Router, Firebase, MongoDB, and Heroku

name: Bicycle Warehouse
features: It has been made responsive using Bootstrap. You can log in here using. Gmail and a custom email. You can add products and manage orders etc.
technology: JavaScript, ReactJS, JSX, React Router, Firebase, MongoDB, and Heroku

name: Paxton Photostat
features: It has been made responsive using Bootstrap. You can log in here using. Gmail and a custom email. You can be booked orders.
